original_title: Timperley Testcard Transmissions: Starring Frank Sidebottom & Little Frank
overview: Join Frank Sidebottom and Little Frank as they waste everyone’s time by creating a ‘living test card’ for the now defunct local cable TV company Channel M... transmitting into the small hours, until they become big again!
tagline: “Switch off now! Unless you are a TV engineer!”
title: Timperley Testcard Transmissions: Starring Frank Sidebottom & Little Frank
